restaurants.title: Adria Ristorante & Bar
restaurants.info: The best gluten free pasta in Stockholm, it is fresh and so delicious!

restaurants.title: Sue Ellen
restaurants.info: The Waitors are extremly nice the food is phenomenal. Specially  the lobster slider and the moose stew

restaurants.title: Zios Pasta & Pizza Italian Restaurant
restaurants.info: Pasta and pizza restaurant serving tasty food with friendly staff. Good value for money at lunchtime with pastas and pizzas at 95 SEK, including bread, water and coffee.

restaurants.title: Shahrzad
restaurants.info: A traditional Persian restaurant in the central area of Stockholm.
